title: Shin Megami Tensei: If... Gakuen no Akuma Tsukai
original_name: 真・女神転生 if... [学園の悪魔使い
sinopse:
Based on the video game "Shin Megami Tensei: if..." for the Super Famicon.

"Shin Megami Tensei: if..." is about Karukozaka High School which, along with the students and staff, is magically transported to the realm of Makai: the demon world.

(Source: MU)
